channel.title: letters home on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in letters home on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.2: Two weeks in the USA
item.description: 2nd July 2014 Hello everyone, Today I took the driversâ€™ written test and passed with flying colours. I got all answers correct! I studied hard for the last couple of days although I was preparing using videos even sometime last week.

item.title: LOG 4.5: Hello Germany, From Bangalore
item.description: 9th May 2014 My dear friends, I said Iâ€™d write, so here I am ðŸ™‚ My thoughts and dreams wander back to you all often. I have been away from Oldenburg for longer than a month before for holidays but this time, even when it had only been two weeks, it felt like longer.

item.title: LOG 4.1: Thoughts on a rainy afternoon
item.description: 14th September 2013 Hello everyone, I live close to the Uni so my daily space is very small. But recently I have visited my old flatmate Lea in Bremen once for dinner and once for their housewarming party.

item.title: LOG 3.7 Of rain and coming home
item.description: 19th June 2013 The sound, smell and sight of a storm are reassuring and comforting to me. I sit here thousands of miles away listening to Ghanana ghanana from Lagaan for a moment transported to Bangalore.

item.title: LfE 27: Home
item.description: 22/08/2010 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I hope everything is going well with all of you. This is the final mail Iâ€™ll send from Edinburgh to all of you because my magical and memorable year has come to an end.

item.title: LfE 20: Dundee
item.description: 25/02/2010 I went to Dundee for a training session for the postgrad review job that I have. It snow-stormed in the morning. Wild winds. Train was good.

item.title: LfE 16: Back in Edinburgh
item.description: 12/01/2010 Hi everyone, Hope you all had a good holiday. Iâ€™m back in Edinburgh, this familiar and beautiful city. I actually have developed a kind of loyalty to it.

item.title: LfE 15: A visit to Oxford and Thoughts in Slough
item.description: 29/12/2009 Hello ðŸ™‚ I have been in Slough, a town near London, for around two weeks now. It has been restful to spend time with family, watch movies, go shopping etc.

item.title: LfE 12: Weekend activities
item.description: 29/11/2009 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ Itâ€™s a Sunday. Four degrees celsius as I write, and cloudy. A bunch of us friends are going to the German market today on Princes Street.

item.title: LfE 11: Glasgow and Animal Handling
item.description: 18/11/2009 Hello everyone! This time I have more to say ðŸ™‚ I have a laptop now. Acer Aspireâ€¦metallic midnight blueâ€¦itâ€™s my first ever so Iâ€™m very attached, and loving to it.

item.title: LfE 10: Enormous Work Load and Frost
item.description: 09/11/20009 Hi! Itâ€™s me again ðŸ™‚ All is well with me and I hope you are all equally well. The pressure in Uni to get work done has suddenly risen exponentially and the weather is getting colder by the day.
